page.title: 15Housing-Home life
page.content: A small council estate with bungalows and flats for the elderly and single person, lies fairly close to the village centre,otherwise most property is privately owned. Young couples looking for a first home or single people wanting smaller accommodation have little choice. There are several holiday cottages in the area, restricting cottages available for letting. Thorncombe is classified under the Dorset Rural Development Scheme as a village needing special help with housing and light industry, so there is some hope that these two social concerns may soon be met. Home life for the farming community (not to mention the back up service) the farmer's wife give him) is very important. Often the chores include a number of farm chores also.
